title: How to make chutney
description: Chutney is great make ahead gift for Christmas – you can substitute marrows, pumpkin, green tomatoes or other fruit for some or all of the apples and the results will be just as good.Equipment and preparation: You will need eight 330ml/12fl oz jars.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz sultanas (or other dried fruit such as dates and raisins)
